componentMetadata.docblock: Display a maintenance banner for a given time window.

childrenComponentProp.name: content
childrenComponentProp.docblock: The content of the banner for downtime.

childrenComponentProp.name: expiresAt
childrenComponentProp.docblock: A 'moment' object used when downtime expires. Use `moment.utc()` to get the correct display time.

childrenComponentProp.name: id
childrenComponentProp.docblock: A unique ID that will be used for conditionally rendering the banner based on if the user has dismissed it already.

childrenComponentProp.name: startsAt
childrenComponentProp.docblock: A 'moment' object used when downtime starts. Use `moment.utc()` to get the correct display time.

childrenComponentProp.name: title
childrenComponentProp.docblock: The title of the banner for downtime.

childrenComponentProp.name: warnContent
childrenComponentProp.docblock: The content of the banner for pre-downtime.

childrenComponentProp.name: warnStartsAt
childrenComponentProp.docblock: A 'moment' object used when pre-downtime starts. Use `moment.utc()` to get the correct display time.

childrenComponentProp.name: warnTitle
childrenComponentProp.docblock: The title of the banner for pre-downtime.
